Work with us

[/nectar_highlighted_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]As an educational institution, we keep as one of our priorities the formation and maintenance of a competent work team, with excellent preparation and commitment. This is why we give great importance to our hiring processes.

We want to retain the very best faculty and staff, all working together to support academic excellence with the ultimate end goal of inspiring our students. We hire motivated, qualified, innovative, and passionate individuals with the expertise and diversity needed to achieve strategic goals. We inspire and reward our employees with meaningful professional development opportunities, comprehensive and competitive compensation and benefits and community feel within the workplace.

Our teaching staff includes both local Colombian teachers and teachers from other countries.

If you are a teacher, we encourage you to send us your information. We create a file for each candidate that meets certain position requirements and once a vacancy opens all qualifying candidates are contacted and encouraged to apply.

We are especially interested in teachers with the following characteristics:

  • Teachers for all courses and levels, with a degree in education and an English proficiency level of at least B2 according to the European Common Framework.
  • Teachers for all levels and courses, especially English, Social Studies and Science (General Science, Physics, Biology and Chemistry), with a degree in education and an English proficiency level of at least B2 according to the European Common Framework.
  • Teachers for all courses and levels, with a degree in education and an English proficiency level of at least B2 according to the European Common Framework, who are certified as teachers by the Ministry of Education of British Columbia, Canada.
  • Science (Physics, Biology and Chemistry) and Math teachers, for grades 7-12, who are certified as teachers by the Ministry of Education of British Columbia, Canada.
  • French teachers.

Please send your resume to the e-mail address jobs@colegiocanadiense.edu.co.

We thank all candidates and advise that only those selected for an interview will be contacted.

Current Vacancies

At the moment we have no vacancies available.

[/vc_column_text]
